text: Sardhana is a constituency of the Indian Legislative Assembly, in the Uttar Pradesh region of India.http://www.elections.in/uttar-pradesh/assembly- constituencies/sardhana.html == Members of Legislative Assembly == {| class="wikitable sortable mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" width="80%" |+ |- ! colspan="2" style="background-color:#666666; color:white" |Year ! style="background-color:#666666; color:white" |Member ! style="background- color:#666666; color:white" |Political Party |- | style="background-color: " | || 1967 || Ram Ji Lal Sahayak ||Indian National Congress |- | style="background-color: " | || 1969 || D. V. Singh ||Independent |- | style="background-color: " | || 1974 || Nazir Ahmad ||Bharatiya Kranti Dal |- | style="background-color: " | || 1977 ||Brahmvir Singh||Janata Party |- | style="background-color: " | || 1980 || Syed Zakiuddin ||Indian National Congress (Indira) |- | style="background-color: " | || 1985 || Abdul Wahid Qureshi ||Lok Dal |- | style="background-color: " | || 1989 || Amar Pal ||Bharatiya Janata Party |- | style="background-color: " | || 1991 ||Vijay Pal Singh Tomar||Janata Dal |- | style="background-color: " | || 1993 || Ravindra Pundir ||Bharatiya Janata Party |- | style="background-color: " | || 1996 || Ravindra Pundir ||Bharatiya Janata Party |- | style="background-color: " | || 2002 || Ravindra Pundir ||Bharatiya Janata Party |- | style="background-color: " | || 2007 || Chandra Veer Singh ||Bahujan Samaj Party |- | style="background-color: " | || 2012 ||Sangeet Singh Som ||Bharatiya Janata Party |- | style="background-color: " | || 2017 || Sangeet Singh Som ||Bharatiya Janata Party |} ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Uttar Pradesh Category:Politics of Meerut district
